roleset.name: of disease with no known cause

example.name: arg1
example.text: # 2 Pulmonary hypertension which may be idiopathic but is compounded by her obesity , previous evidence of nocturnal hypoventilation , hypertensive left heart disease with elevated left filling pressure

roleset.note: IDIOPATHIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from idiopathic.01-j)
